---
id: QuerySingle订单
title: Query Single 订单
sidebar_label: Query Single 订单
sidebar_position: 1
description: /spot/v4/order
---

**类型:** GET

**描述:** `/spot/v4/order`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### 参数

| 名称            | 类型   | 必需 | 默认值值 | 描述     |
| --------------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | --------------- |
| `orderId`       | 数字 | No        |         | 订单 ID        |
| `client订单Id` | 字符串 | No        |         | Client order ID |

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
    "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
    "client订单Id": "16559590087220001",
    "base货币": "字符串",
    "quote货币": "字符串",
    "side": "BUY",             // order side: BUY, SELL
    "type": "LIMIT",           // order type: LIMIT, MARKET
```
